entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (nova_orion_flavor_npc_cloning_01.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_4: Blown up in my ship! Well, at least it was given to me by the station. I can't believe they'll let just about anyone fly off into space. They really should at least warn people that it's dangerous out there.
